Title: The Field Where I Died
Plot: After an FBI raid on a doomsday cult called the "Temple of the Seven Stars", Mulder meets Melissa, a cultist who claims to have known him in a previous life during the American Civil War. Scully believes the woman is a delusional schizophrenic, but Mulder allows himself to be drawn into her fantasies.
GuestStars: Donna White, Doug Abrahams, Anthony Harrison, Michael Dobson, Les Gallagher, Douglas Roy Dack, Kristen Cloke, Michael Massee
